entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 60 percent chance of light snow late this evening and overnight. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Saturday 1 April 2023
